description: Primary key uniquely identifying this membership record.
Name of the user group or role associated to a dashboard; likely a security principal rather than an individual user; confirm with SME.
Business name of the dashboard to which the member is granted visibility or access.
Timestamp when this record was last changed, typically in UTC with sub-second precision.
Identifier of the user account that created this membership record, for audit purposes.
Timestamp when this record was initially created.
Identifier of the user account that last updated this record.
Timestamp when this record was last updated by a user action.
